isis.stitle: HEAT VENTILATION AIR CONDITIONING (HVAC) SYSTEM - ProStar - SPECIAL TOOLS - RECOVERY/RECYCLING/RECHARGING STATION

svcproc.title: RECOVERY/RECYCLING/RECHARGING STATION
svcproc.para: The Recovery/Recycling/Recharging Station (ZTSE4615) for R-134a is a totally integrated A/C service system, which recovers, recycles, evacuates, and recharges R-134a quickly and accurately (refer to Figure 79).

figure.caption: Figure 79. Recovery/Recycling and Charging Station, ZTSE4615

svcproc.para: With its built-in manifold, all A/C service work is done with one hookup. The unit is programmed at its panel-mounted keypad. Computerized controls and solenoids precisely monitor evacuation and charging time. It is designed to automatically shut off after the recovery cycle. A moisture indicator will change from yellow to green when recycling is complete.
